urls.title: Make every drop count this summer with Water’s Worth Saving
urls.description: Water UK and Waterwise launch their 2021 Water’s Worth Saving campaign Easy top-tips show how everyone can take important water-saving measures at home Green-fingered, DIY enthusiasts, families and Generation Z can all make a big difference Everyone is being encouraged to make every drop count this summer as Water UK joins forces with water efficiency experts, Waterwise, to launch their 2021 Water’s Worth Saving campaign. Water’s Worth Saving aims to drive change in how we use water – we need to act fast

text:
We're encouraging everyone to make every drop count this summer with our #WatersWorthSaving campaign.

Why not make a start this #BankHoliday!

Find out more: https://t.co/i2NRiZpvDe

@Waterwise @EnvAgency @Ofwat @CCWvoice 

#BankHolidayMonday

urls.title: Graduate job board for south west England
urls.description: Gradsouthwest, the graduate job board for south west England, specialises in advertising graduate jobs, graduate schemes, graduate internships and degree apprenticeships across south west England including Devon, Cornwall, Bristol, Somerset, Dorset, Hampshire, Wiltshire, West of England and Gloucestershire

text:
Always :-) when @GradSWJobs delivers good things - @EnvAgency Civil & Electrical Eng. grad scheme. As EA says "We work to create better places for people & wildlife, & support sustainable development" More & apply: https://t.co/VKVjEFM9lS
#graduaterecruitment #engineeringjobs https://t.co/czeYNihCqQ
